name: Sligh: The Devourer
description:
- CURSOR ISSUES? -

Click in the embedded window while the game is loading ( when the loading bar is visible).  This will capture the mouse and allow much easier control.  Press "Esc" to release the cursor again.

Sligh the Devourer is trapped in a raid dungeon for all eternity.  He will eventually be slain by one of the adventures crossing his path to steal his loot.

Help Sligh fight back as long as he can before his inevitable death!

WASDMove
Left MouseLight Attack
Right MouseHeavy AttackShiftDash AttackRRestartPPause/SettingsESCFree Cursor
